abstract: Former Valparaiso University men's basketball coach Homer Drew and his wife Janet Drew have both been diagnosed with cancer.
snippet: The former Valparaiso coach Homer Drew and his wife, Janet, have both learned they have cancer, an athletic department spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: The former Valparaiso coach Homer Drew and his wife, Janet, have both learned they have cancer, an athletic department spokesman said.

headline.seo: Former Valparaiso Coach and Wife Have Cancer
